sentences.en: " Come up hither, Hester, thou and Little Pearl,'said the Reverend Mr. Dimmesdale.
sentences.cn: “ 上这儿来吧, 海丝特, 你,还有小珠儿, ” 可敬的丁梅斯代尔先生说.

sentences.en: " Nay, I think not so, " rejoined the Reverend Mr. Dimmesdale.
sentences.cn: “ 不, 我看不必了, ” 丁梅斯代尔牧师先生接口说.

sentences.en: A reverend gentleman is here to see you.
Communion was celebrated by the Reverend John Harris.
sentences.cn: 圣餐仪式由约翰·哈里斯牧师主持.

sentences.en: Even the most reverend judges can make a bad decision.
sentences.cn: 就连最值得崇敬的法官也会判断失误.

sentences.en: His faith that men such as the Reverend John Leale tried to do their best is unshaken.
sentences.cn: 他始终深信约翰·莱亚莱神父等人已经尽了全力了。

sentences.en: I reckon he was the best - hated man among us, except the Reverend Burgess. "
sentences.cn: 叫我说, 除了 伯杰斯 牧师,在咱们这些人当中,最遭人恨的就是他了.

sentences.en: Oh , I won't need to whistle for them, Reverend Captain.
sentences.cn: 尊敬的上校, 我不需要用哨子来叫他们.

sentences.en: Reverend Jones has moved to a new church.
sentences.cn: 琼斯牧师搬到新教堂去了.
尊敬的查尔斯∙道奇森牧师

sentences.en: The Reverend Mr. Dimmesdale bent his head, silent prayer, as It'seemed, and then came forward.
sentences.cn: 丁梅斯代尔牧师先生低下头去, 像是在默默祈祷, 然后便迈步向前.

sentences.en: The self - styled ` Reverend'Harper is not a real clergyman at all.
sentences.cn: 这位自称‘教士 ’ 的哈珀根本就不是真正的教士.

sentences.en: The service was led by the Reverend Jim Simons.
sentences.cn: 这次礼拜仪式是由吉姆·西蒙斯牧师大人主持的。

sentences.en: There remained the schoolmaster - probably now a reverend parson.
sentences.cn: 还有他那位教师哪,也许现在是一位令人敬重的牧师了.

sentences.en: What else does the Reverend Mother say?

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的；表示尊敬的；可尊敬的

phrases.tran_cn: 最尊敬的大主教大人（大主教的尊称）
n. （对女修道院院长的称呼）院长嬷嬷

trans.tran_cn: 可尊敬的，教士的，对牧师或神父的尊称
